name: Market Warfare
description:
Save the market!

After a lot of trouble, the Vegetable Pact decided that it is time to take their place within the Market. Meanwhile, the Great Fruit Army must prepare to defend themeselves on all possible fronts against the vegetable invasion.
Build your strategy: recruit your units and build the best team to prevent the Vegetables from reaching your base.

FEATURES


  • - Action Salad: Fruits versus vegetables, the most unexpected combat of all times.
  • ¡A bailar!: Enjoy a very original soundtrack, the result of mixing different Latin music styles, including cumbia, salsa, banda and more.
  • - Adventure Mode: Defend the Market through different scenarios, each with different characteristics that will make you adapt. your play style.
  • - Build your own strategy: Recruit new units as you progress through the adventure to better suit your play style.
  • - Manage your money: Don't overspend, if you run out of money you won't be able to buy more fruits to defend and your enemies will defeat you.
